verses.roman:
sabe kṛpā kari' iṅhāre deha' ei vara
vraja-līlā-prema-rasa yena varṇe nirantara

synonyms: sabe—all of you; kṛpā kari'-showing your mercy; iṅhāre—unto Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; deha'-give; ei vara—this benediction; vraja-līlā-prema-rasa—transcendental mellows of the pastimes of Vṛndāvana; yena—so that; varṇe—he can describe; nirantara—without cessation.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu requested all His personal associates to bless Rūpa Gosvāmī so that he might continuously describe the pastimes of Vṛndāvana, which are full of emotional love of Godhead.
